Design
======

Moksha aims to simplify the design process and allow you to quickly being
innovating.  To do this Moksha supports a variety of CSS and JavaScript
frameworks, making it easy to utilize and leverage existing plugins.

CSS Frameworks
--------------

.. toctree::

   Blueprint


JavaScript Frameworks
---------------------

jQuery
~~~~~~

See the `ToscaWidgets Cookbook <http://turbogears.org/2.0/docs/main/ToscaWidgets/Cookbook.html>`_ for some examples.

See the :mod:`tw.jquery` module for many useful jQuery plugins.

:note: More jQuery-docs coming soon!
